value.mermaid:
erDiagram
    events {
        UUID id PK
        VARCHAR(100) title
        TEXT description
        VARCHAR(20) event_type
        TIMESTAMP start_datetime
        TIMESTAMP end_datetime
        JSONB venue
        TIMESTAMP registration_start
        TIMESTAMP registration_end
        VARCHAR(20) status
        UUID series_id FK
        TIMESTAMP created_at
        TIMESTAMP updated_at
    }
    series {
        UUID id PK
        VARCHAR(100) title
        TEXT description
    }
    tickets {
        UUID id PK
        UUID event_id FK
        VARCHAR(50) name
        INTEGER price
        INTEGER capacity
        TEXT description
    }
    registrations {
        UUID id PK
        UUID event_id FK
        UUID ticket_id FK
        JSONB participant_info
        VARCHAR(20) status
        VARCHAR(20) attendance
    }
    surveys {
        UUID id PK
        UUID event_id FK
        JSONB questions
    }
    survey_responses {
        UUID id PK
        UUID survey_id FK
        UUID registration_id FK
        JSONB answers
    }
    mail_templates {
        UUID id PK
        UUID event_id FK
        VARCHAR(20) type
        VARCHAR(100) subject
        TEXT body
    }
    events ||--o{ tickets : has
    events ||--o{ registrations : has
    events ||--o{ surveys : has
    events ||--o{ mail_templates : has
    events }o--|| series : belongs_to
    tickets ||--o{ registrations : has
    surveys ||--o{ survey_responses : has
    registrations ||--o{ survey_responses : has
